item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: I enjoyed EQ #14, <em>Love of the Forest</em>.

item.title: By: Factory
item.dc:creator: Factory
item.description:
Final Fantasy VII (10229) Oh dear.
Oh well if you can't beat them, join them.
AfkGamer: The Joining Once upon a time on a cold and wintery night... ... "You have to find all five missing pieces of the Line of Url before you can enter the portal." said the tavern keeper. "Oh, and I have this rat infestantion in my celler"... ..."That's ok baby, I can fix that problem of not having any night elf in you." Foton proclaimed as he removed his tunic... ... "What? The Portal isn't in this castle?".... ... "You will die, Lum!" yelled Foton as he drew his +5 damage rapier with water and fire resists.... ... and so it ended happily ever after.
Oh man I'm going to win a nobel for this one..
item.content:encoded:
Final Fantasy VII (10229)
Oh dear.

Oh well if you can’t beat them, join them.

AfkGamer: The Joining
Once upon a time on a cold and wintery night…
… “You have to find all five missing pieces of the Line of Url before you can enter the portal.” said the tavern keeper. “Oh, and I have this rat infestantion in my celler”…
…”That’s ok baby, I can fix that problem of not having any night elf in you.” Foton proclaimed as he removed his tunic…
… “What? The Portal isn’t in this castle?”….
… “You will die, Lum!” yelled Foton as he drew his +5 damage rapier with water and fire resists….
… and so it ended happily ever after.

Oh man I’m going to win a nobel for this one..
